item.title: converting CSV to ORC with Apache NiFi
item.description: Converting a CSV to ORC files usually takes a Hadoop cluster to perform the task. Since I only wanted to convert files for later uploading into an existing cluster, I tried some different approach. Searching for some tool to do the task, I arrived at Apache NiFi. Here is the flow I used to transform my data. step 1 - list all exiting CSV files step 2 - read each file into memory step 3 - convert content into AVRO sadly AVRO needs a schema of you data to do the actual conversion.
